# format:
# rule name: definition
ionian: ! m2 && ! m3 && ! d5 && ! m6 && ! m7
lydian: ! m2 && ! m3 && ! 4 && ! m6 && ! m7
octave3: 444444440000
high_root: 600000000000 && ( ! 100000000000 ) && 011111111111

root: 700000000000
m2:   070000000000
M2:   007000000000
m3:   000700000000
M3:   000070000000
4:    000007000000
d5:   000000700000
5:    000000070000
m6:   000000003000
M6:   000000000300
m7:   000000000030
M7:   000000000003
